metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000232 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A double-free vulnerability in str2host.c in ldns 1.7.0 have unspecified impact and attack vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldnsutils - 1.6.17-8ubuntu0.1
libldns1 - 1.6.17-8ubuntu0.1
python-ldns - 1.6.17-8ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ldns package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.17-8ubuntu0.1').
